This is some of the evidence so far that has been presented to the Courts & dispel rumors & false accusations.. *https://www.fairfaxcounty.gov/circuit/high-profile-cases*  ((Scroll down to the dropdown box & choose high-profile-cases - Depp should be the only choice))
This is just a bit of evidence that actually proves HER LIES.. There are pages & pages of facts proving SHE was actually the ABUSER.. 80 videos, 30+ witnesses w/affidavits & past victims of Domestic Violence perpetrated by Amber Heard, who have been scheduled for depositions..

These videos were made using her version of events, They are able to show serious discrepancies & some outright lies.. They are exceptionally well done in what I consider an unbiased way..
